indicator_name: 불법 거래 혹은 밀렵된 야생생물 비율
target_name: 보호동식물의 밀렵과 밀매 근절을 위한 즉각적인 행동을 촉구하고, 불법야생동식물 제품의 수요와 공급에 대응

en.target: Take urgent action to end poaching and trafficking of protected species of flora and fauna and address both demand and supply of illegal wildlife products
en.title: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
en.indicator_name: Proportion of traded wildlife that was poached or illicitly trafficked
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 210 KB)
en.source_organisation_1: Border Force, UK Visas and Immigration, and Immigration Enforcement
en.source_other_info_1: Please note that the total number of seizures may not equate to the sum of the CITES seizures, this is due to the possibility of multiple seizures. A multiple seizure is where two or more category types (e.g. caviar and timber) are seized on a particular occasion. The occasion is counted once in the total number of seizures, but a seizure is counted against each category.
en.page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
